article.title: U.S. Navy Awards Aegis Threat Analysis Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Systems Engineering Group Inc., Columbia, Md. is being awarded a potential $35,530,805 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract for Aegis Ballistic Missile Defense (ABMD) threat engineering services. This procurement is for integrated system and threat engineering support to the ABMD. This system and threat engineering support provides for integrated weapon systems and missile development, test, and evaluation as it relates to system and threat engineering analytical tools, computer models, hardware enhancements and data generation. The Port Hueneme Division, Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, Calif., is the contracting activity.
